In This Section
This section contains the topic: “
General Information on Presumptive SC of Undiagnosed Illness and Medically Unexplained Chronic Multi-Symptom Illness (MUCMI) for Persian Gulf Veterans
.”
title: M21-1, Part VIII, Subpart ii, Chapter 1, Section A - General Information on Presumptive Service Connection (SC) for Persian Gulf Veterans
citation: Part VIII, Subpart ii, Chapter 1, Section A
